sentences.sContent: I sometimes have to work late.
Sometimes, Grandma would tell us stories about her childhood in Italy.
sentences.sCn: 有时候，祖母会跟我们讲讲她儿时在意大利的经历。

sentences.sContent: ‘Do you ever wish you were back in Japan?’ ‘Sometimes. Not very often.’
sentences.sCn: “你有没有想过希望回到日本？”“有时候吧，但不经常这么想。”

sentences.sContent: The journey takes an hour, sometimes even longer.
sentences.sCn: 路上需要一小时，有时甚至更长。

trans.tranCn: 不时； 有时， 间或
trans.tranOther: on some occasions but not always
